org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.reactors.impl

Interface PoolThreadReactorImpl

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, Blade, Closeable, ReactorImpl, java.lang.Runnable

    public interface PoolThreadReactorImpl
extends ReactorImpl
    Common code for BlockingReactor, NonBlockingReactor and IsolationReactor, which are not bound to a thread.

    PoolThreadReactorImpl supports thread migration only between instances of this class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Runnable getOnIdle()
      The object to be run when the inbox is emptied and before the threadReference is cleared.
      void setOnIdle(java.lang.Runnable onIdle)
